definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
democratic revolution/bourgeois revolution (in Marx-Leninist theory, a prelude to the proletarian revolution)

pinyin: Xin1 Min2 zhu3 zhu3 yi4 Ge2 ming4

definition: Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People (late 1890s)
On New Democracy (1940), by Mao Zedong
pinyin: Xin1 Min2 zhu3 zhu3 yi4 Lun4

definition: Democracy Wall (1978-1989), esp. during the Beijing Spring democracy movement

sentences.english: in terms of our values and our democratic rights and whatever.
sentences.chinese: 就我们的价值观和民主权力而言，诸如此类都是如此。

sentences.english: Just show me one county where Dr. Sun's principles have been put in practice.
sentences.chinese: 你给我指出哪一个县实施了孙中山先生的三民主义？

sentences.english: Democratic supervision is a form of supervision with Chinese characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 民主监督是具有中国特色的一种监督形式。

sentences.english: The democracy of one dollar one vote is not attractive.
sentences.chinese: “一美元一票”的民主制并不具有吸引力。

sentences.english: We think we're all ready to implement universal suffrage in 2012.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为到2012年应有全面的民主参政权。

sentences.english: But the Democrats have lost their sixtieth vote.
sentences.chinese: 但是，民主党人丧失了其第六十票。

sentences.english: Democratic centralism is another of our advantages.
sentences.chinese: 再如民主集中制也是我们的优越性。

sentences.english: The book was quickly brandished by the left as vindication of social democracy.
sentences.chinese: 左翼分子闻风而动，攻击该书宣扬社会民主主义。

sentences.english: Labour says…The process followed by National has been anti-democratic.
sentences.chinese: 工党认为，由国家党主导的这个立法过程是反民主的。

sentences.english: The Syrian government launched a violent campaign against pro-democracy protesters in March.
sentences.chinese: 叙利亚政府三月份对主张民主的示威者展开暴力镇压。

sentences.english: Democratic government gradually take the place of an all-powerful monarchy.
sentences.chinese: 民主政府逐渐取代了强大的君主制。

sentences.english: the ascendant Democrats would merely drag their feet on trade matters.
sentences.chinese: 民主党的上升只会拖拽外贸的脚步。

sentences.english: The organs of self-government of national autonomous areas shall apply the principle of democratic centralism.
sentences.chinese: 民族自治地方的自治机关实行民主集中制的原则。

sentences.english: When you have PDR , abnormal blood vessels grow in the retina.
sentences.chinese: 当你有民主共和国，异常血管生长在视网膜。
基层民主制度进一步健全。

sentences.english: "The only one with the power to unify the party that has grown hugely is Ozawa," said Democratic Party lawmaker Akihisa Nagashima.
sentences.chinese: 民主党权力大增，有能力统一它的只有小泽。
